item.description:
Meet people to network for business or pleasure. Most of the time is for meeting and mingling. Everyone will have a chance to share if you want to, what you are looking for with the full group present too. Feel free to ask Herb any questions about his knowledge and experience with the Enneagram, relationship dynamics, his workshops, etc.

Vegetarian potluck

from 7-10pm $10

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is an Enneagram expert with over 20 years experience teaching personality types workshops He is a relationship counselor and coach, working with individuals, couples and families, leads trainings in organizations and gives presentations and workshops throughout the world.

www.herbpearce.com (workshop schedule) and to sign up for his newsletter
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Networking Event
